name: rolotonybrowntown
text: a spoon full of email helps the medicine go down

name: howard
text: "What?"

name: peterjoel
text: the cat can't believe what he is writing

name: nagsworth
text: I think when he says "What?" it's referring to how obscure he's being, from talking about bringing down internet pornography, to going off on a tangent about being an amateur historian of the automobile industry. The quote marks indicate he is quoting Sumbitches, who would be reading the email, all like, "What?"

name: jackparsons
text: 95% of American men are amateur historians of the automobile industry.

name: lexsenthur
text: Their reasoning is they know who said "You can have any color as long as it's black."

name: mangtastic
text: Walter P. Chrysler?

name: dusty
text: Sir Galaxie G.T. Thunderbird III

name: pastrami
text: ...I always thought that was Ford Prefect.

name: terriblerobot
text:
Fun fact: The Model T was actually offered in many colours from 1908 to 1914, and again from 1926-27. All T's produced between 1915 and 1925 were black, because it is a cheap, fast drying colour.

Amateur automotive historian? FIE! I've got books and books on this shit, and a wingback chair to peruse them at my leisure.

name: vihil
text: Batman?

name: soticoto
text: That's what she said.

name: audhumla
text: malcolm x.

name: spinynorman
text: I only frequent Christian burrito cafes. As I cradle the burrito in my hand just as Abraham did for the lamb whenst Yonnie was lain at his feet, I keep The Lord and His Son in my heart as I absolutely tear into some of that rich barbacoa nonsense.

name: nigelchaos
text: I didn't understand that. But I liked it!

text: ...A phrase usually reserved for one's childhood discovery of masturbation...

name: hellofyellin
text: A handful of grated cheddar cheese and a few diced jalapenos will go far in classing up your average corn-muffin mix.  Make a cinnamon/honey compound butter with a dash of cayenne pepper to spread! MMM!

name: anonymous44
text: cinnamon/honey butter with cayenne pepper is the best spread in the entire universe.

name: hellofyellin
text: Why thank you.

name: soticoto
text: Instachub for Cayenne Pepper : Greatest spice in the known Universe.

name: rockstarsatemy
text: I am allergic to cayenne pepper.  It makes me die.

name: hellofyellin
text: Then you should not eat the butter mentioned above.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I am definitely going to make that butter and put it on toast right now. Thank you, internet.

Please accept this chubby on my behalf, Mr. hellofyellin.

text: Chubby for Strong Sad avatar-comment synergy

text: Why don't people write stuff like this back to the scammers? How can they call bullshit on that without indirectly calling bullshit on themselves?

text: Oh but they do! http://www.419eater.com  - they engage in bogus dialogue with scammers to waste their time and money. There's some pretty hilarious stuff on here.

text:
Brian Wheat, As Has Been Proven.

The common occurrence of "loosen" makes me want to stab people. Fo' reals. WHY WOULD IT HAVE TWO OS. THE WORD "LOSE" DOES NOT HAVE TWO OS. WHY WOULD THAT BE THE CASE FOR THE PRESENT PARTICIPLE. YOU FUCKING IDIOT.
